so why Green is a pace financing company
what that means is we take the equity in
a home or a business building commercial
building and we give people money for
specific things for us it was we have a
lot of data that we process a
specifically underwriting data we have
tons of different points that we have to
validate about the property about the
company or about the person and so for
us we have lots of data sources that are
being aggregated and we also have lots
of systems that need to churn on that
data so it came down to some scalability
issues for us where we were running
everything on massive servers that we
just reached the limit of being able to
scale them vertically so using
kubernetes we were able to you know
scale out vertically and distribute
those workloads just like just like
anybody else we're actually running
kubernetes clusters at the 10th of a
cost because we're using AWS ec2 spot
which the kubernetes Copps project has
allowed us to do and we're also able to
deploy a lot more frequently so we were
we were deploying every week to two
weeks and now we're deploying in the
middle of the week during the day time
and things like that and we're also
doing it without any downtime CN CF has
been an amazing incubator for so many
other projects and and now we we look at
CN CF the web page of regularly to find
out if there's any new awesome high
quality projects that we can implement
into our our stack it's actually become
a hub for us of knowing what software we
need to be looking at to make our
systems more secure or more scalable
a widening kubernetes has changed the
game as far as scalability and
observability and security we couldn't
do the things that we're doing now we're
adding new data sources that are very
secure data and without the security
abstractions that kubernetes is giving
us separating pods and without the
observability that fluent D and other
CNC of projects are giving us we
couldn't do these things in a way that
we could tell our investors and our team
members that we know what's going on in
the future we'd love to implement a lot
more of the CNC F projects we consider
all of them to be very high quality the
hot ones that I'm looking at are spiffy
and spire as well as the sto service
mesh we have a lot of micro services and
a lot more planned and we want to be
able to abstract the authentication
between those and the identity
management between those so that we
don't spin our wheels on creating
authentication profiles and things like
that for something that's already been
solved
